PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The calculated I SC from the EQE was 15% less than the measured I SC .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Calculated I SC |
| Measured I SC |

Explanation:

* "Calculated I SC" is a property name referring to the short-circuit current (I SC) that has been calculated.
* "Measured I SC" is a property name referring to the short-circuit current (I SC) that has been measured.

Both "Calculated I SC" and "Measured I SC" are entities because they are specific terms used in the context of the paragraph to refer to particular measurements or calculations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| I SC |

Explanation:

* "I SC" is a material property referring to the short-circuit current.

"Calculated I SC" and "Measured I SC" are not material properties themselves, but rather ways of referring to the measurement or calculation of the material property "I SC". Therefore, only "I SC" is a valid material property entity in this paragraph.
